AdminPage.title: Welcome to the admin pannel of official Kids City's website

Catalogue.title: Our Clothes
Catalogue.description: The best and highest quality children's clothing in Samarkand!

AboutSection.title: About us
paragraph: In 2020, during the COVID-19 pandemic, the founder of our store launched an online children's clothing store in Samarkand. The idea came after several unsuccessful purchases - the wrong size, low quality, and the stores were closed.
She decided to look for wholesale suppliers: first in Uzbekistan, then in Turkey and China. That's how the goal emerged - to help other mothers buy quality clothes at an affordable price.
The first customers were relatives and friends. For 3 years the store worked online, but due to numerous requests from customers an offline store was opened.
Since April 2023, we offer high-quality clothing for children from 0 to 14 years old, working only with trusted manufacturers from China, Turkey and the USA.

firstFactor.name: High quality imported clothing
firstFactor.cause: We have a wide range of high quality clothing at good prices from China, USA and Turkey.

secondFactor.name: Delivery throughout the Republic
secondFactor.cause: You can order our clothes online, come to the store and try on the item you like. Delivery is available throughout the republic and beyond.

thirdFactor.name: Constant discounts and promotions
thirdFactor.cause: We often have promotions and discounts on holidays and when purchasing two or more items.

PhotosSection.title: Photos of our store
PhotosSection.description: These are photos of our store inside and outside.

CartPage.title: Your Cart
CartPage.name: Name
CartPage.dialogDescription: Please fill out the form below to arrange delivery.

item1.title: What should I do after I've ordered an item?
item1.content: After you've placed an order, we'll contact you within 24 hours to confirm your order and discuss delivery details.

item2.title: What form of payment is available?
item2.content: We accept cash and bank transfers. You can choose the most convenient payment method for you when placing your order.

item3.title: What is the delivery time?
item3.content: Delivery time depends on your location and stock status. Delivery usually takes 1 to 5 business days.

item4.title: How can I cancel or change my order?
item4.content: You can cancel or change your order by contacting our customer service. Please do this as soon as possible so that we can process your request.

item5.title: How can I track my order?
item5.content: After sending your order, we will put a status on your order, which you can track on your profile page and you can look at your other orders

404.title: 404 - Page Not Found
404.description: The page you are looking for does not exist. Please check the URL or return to the homepage.
